channel.title: Owner Crown [PI]
channel.description: Hi, i'm using HyBriD PvP, a PI base server, and i'm trying to create an owner crown, i just edited it using paint, changed it to red and put an 'O' on it.. anyways, i need help getting it to still have the admin crown, but also have the new Owner crown. any ideas? thanks :D

item.title: Owner Crown [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runeuser8687 runeuser8687
item.description:
@runeuser8687 wrote:

i got the crown to work in yell, but not in regular chat, it’s still the gold crown

EDIT: i got it to work in both, but then i switched my rights to 2 to see if admin was still good and now admins have the owner crown… so i basically accomplished nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Crown [PI]
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

For me, I just changed the color of the crowns…

Idk if this will screw yours up but when u save the crown in paint just overwrite the crown in the file…

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Crown [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runeuser8687 runeuser8687
item.description:
@runeuser8687 wrote:

compiler? u need to fix it, make sure u have the right jdk in the compiler, click edit and see, it should match your version of java… here’s my compiler code and it works fine @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

see the jdk1.60_26? it was 1.60_24 before so i just changed it to 26, my version of java, and it works

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Crown [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Breezeywins Breezeywins
item.description:
@Breezeywins wrote:

Well I have no clue but can you tell me what do i do if this message comes up when i try to run the server.

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

Could you please help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Crown [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runeuser8687 runeuser8687
item.description:
@runeuser8687 wrote:

ya, i need to just change it so instead of the gold crown being used for players with rights 2 and 3, i want the gold crown to be for rights = 2 and the owner crown for rights = 3

Read full topic
